attributes.description:
6-speaker, touchscreen audio system with USB and Bluetooth functionality, Android Auto Plus Show,  Apple CarPlay and navigation. Dual-zone climate control and a 12V socket is also seen on the lower section of the dashboard. The 3-spoke leather steering wheel is only rake-adjustable and comes equipped with mounted controls. Apart from the features already mentioned, the Rush is also equipped with electric and retractable side mirrors, auto-off LED headlights, an integrated reverse camera with park distance control, keyless entry and a push-start ignition. In terms of safety, a total of 6 airbags are fitted as well as ABS, Vehicle Stability Control (VSC) and Hill Control Assist (HCA).
